name: DeckDeDungeon
description:
This is "Deck building Dungeon RPG" !
Challenge difficult dungeons and build your Deck!!

- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Play action, skill, equip cards. Defeat Notorious Monsters!

- "Deck building Dungeon RPG" as never before!
- It is Roguelike. Challenge deeper and deeper!
- You can choose one of 12 hero!
- Collect golds, and buy additional cards!
- There are 239 cards! Collect and build your deck.
- Dangerous Monsters and Challenge to various bosses.
- Various situation, and High Replayablity.
